error_url:
Sorry, the link you sent is Invalid, Please make sure the link is valid and resend it.
 If the issue continues please submit a bug using *feedback* command.
error_openai:
Sorry, the article you sent is too long for us to summarize.
 This is a beta feature, so we are still working on making it better.
 Please try using a shorter article.Thank you!
error_audio: We couldn't create an audio narration of the article.
error:
I could not understand that or something is wrong..
 If the issue continues please submit a bug using *feedback* command.
success: Here is a summary for this article
suffix: This summary is brought to you by fredo.ai, your WhatsApp assistant bot
too_long_will_try: the text is too long, but will try to summarize it
